animated.description: Whether or not to use animations

:count.description: For as many templates as possible to render, it is recommended to use the smallest number possible
:count.description_zh: 渲染多少个 template, 建议使用尽可能小的数字

:loading.description: Whether to display the skeleton screen
:loading.description_zh: 是否显示 skeleton 骨架屏

:rows.description: The number of skeletal screen paragraphs

:throttle.description: The time it takes for a deferred placeholder DOM to render, in milliseconds
:throttle.description_zh: 延迟占位 DOM 渲染的时间, 单位是毫秒

slots.name: default
slots.description: Used to show the real UI

slots.name: template
slots.description_zh: 用来展示自定义占位符
